episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a range of fascinating topics, including protective measures for pets against bald eagles in Alaska, the extravagant lifestyle of the last emperor of the Shang dynasty, the contagious nature of phone-checking behavior, and the impressive drinking capabilities of elephants.

facts.fact: Some dog owners in Alaska are putting spiky jackets on their pets to stop bald eagles from carrying them away.
The last emperor of the Shang dynasty built a wine lake and a meat forest for himself.
If you look at your phone when you're out, half the people around you will do the same within 30 seconds.
Elephants can down 5 pints in under a second.
